column50: ]Always tryin' to let go of anything that'll burden me[
column51: ]That's the reason you can feel the tension and the urgency[
column52: ]Last chance I get to make sure that you take it personally[
column53: ]Take this shit to heart, it's always executed perfectly[
column54: ]If we do a song it's like takin' my kids to work with me[
column55: ]You overnight celebrity, you one day star[
column56: ]Swear I Told You that I'm in this bitch for eternity[
column57: ]I am a reflection of all of your insecurities[
column58: ]Behind closed doors, a lot of 6 God worshipping[
column59: ]Done talk now, 'cause there's other shit that's concernin' me[

column61: ]I want to make sure they learn from me[
column62: ]I want to see my dog, but his grandmother's his surety[
column63: ]He can't even dip out to see me in an emergency[
column64: ]My life is set around competition and currency[
column65: ]Takin' summer off, 'cause they tell me I need recovery[
column66: ]Maybe gettin' back to my regular life will humble me[
column67: ]I'll be back in 2018 to give you the summary[
